Onboarding.selectYourRoleDescription: What's your role within the company?
Onboarding.waitingForInvitationDescription: To access your company's features, an existing admin must invite you. Please contact your company admin for an invitation. You'll receive an email notification once the invitation is sent.

Roles.adminDescription: Set up the company account, manage team members, and access all the features available to Property Managers.
Roles.propertyManagerDescription: Manage property details, schedule meetings, record and document meeting minutes, and manage meeting attachments.

Team.deleteUserConfirmation: Are you sure? Deleting a user from your company is irreversible!
